original_text: And they rose up in the twilight, to go unto the camp of the Syrians: and when they were come to the uttermost part of the camp of Syria, behold, there was no man there.
korean_text: 아람 진으로 가려 하여 해 질 무렵에 일어나 아람 진영 끝에 이르러서 본즉 그 곳에 한 사람도 없으니

sentences.original_text: And they rose up in twilight
to go unto the camp of Syrians
to the uttermost part of the camp of Syria
behold, there was no man there
